backgrounds.name: Soldier
backgrounds.description: You served in an army or militia, learning the ways of combat.
backgrounds.lore: Years of drilling, marching, and fighting have hardened your body and mind. You've seen comrades fall and enemies routed, and you carry those experiences with you.
backgrounds.starterAbilityDescription: Stun an enemy for one turn using your shield.

backgrounds.name: Scholar
backgrounds.description: You spent years studying ancient texts and accumulating knowledge.
backgrounds.lore: The musty halls of libraries and academies were your home. You learned that knowledge is power, and you've accumulated quite a bit of both.
backgrounds.starterAbilityDescription: Identify items and gain insight into monster weaknesses.

backgrounds.name: Thief
backgrounds.description: You lived by your wits and nimble fingers in the city's shadows.
backgrounds.lore: The streets taught you that the wealthy rarely deserve their fortune, and that a quick hand and quicker feet can level the playing field.
backgrounds.starterAbilityDescription: Deal double damage when attacking from stealth.

backgrounds.name: Healer
backgrounds.description: You dedicated yourself to tending the sick and wounded.
backgrounds.lore: Whether in a temple infirmary or a battlefield medical tent, you learned the art of mending flesh and soothing pain. Life is precious, and you've sworn to preserve it.
backgrounds.starterAbilityDescription: Restore a small amount of health to yourself or an ally.

backgrounds.name: Mountainborn
backgrounds.description: You were raised in the harsh mountain peaks, building endurance.
backgrounds.lore: The thin air and treacherous terrain of the high peaks forged you into someone who can endure hardships that would break others.
backgrounds.starterAbilityDescription: Resist exhaustion and recover faster from exertion.

backgrounds.name: Coastlander
backgrounds.description: You grew up along the shores, at home on both land and sea.
backgrounds.lore: Salt water runs in your veins. The rhythm of the tides taught you patience, and the unpredictable seas made you adaptable.
backgrounds.starterAbilityDescription: Move freely through water without penalty.

backgrounds.name: Forestkin
backgrounds.description: The deep woods were your home, teaching you to track and survive.
backgrounds.lore: Where others see an impenetrable tangle of growth, you see paths, signs, and sanctuary. The forest's secrets are yours to know.
backgrounds.starterAbilityDescription: Follow trails and detect nearby creatures.

backgrounds.name: Cityfolk
backgrounds.description: You were raised in a bustling city, learning to navigate crowds and politics.
backgrounds.lore: The city never sleeps, and neither did you. You learned to read people as easily as street signs, and to find opportunity in every crowded corner.
backgrounds.starterAbilityDescription: Gain advantage on social interactions and finding information.
